original_text: Because they have done that which was evil in my sight, and have provoked me to anger, since the day their fathers came forth out of Egypt, even unto this day.
korean_text: 이는 애굽에서 나온 그의 조상 때부터 오늘까지 내가 보기에 악을 행하여 나의 진노를 일으켰음이니라 하셨더라

sentences.original_text: Because they have done that which was evil in my sight
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 내 눈에 악한 일을 행했기 때문에

sentences.original_text: and have provoked me to anger
since the day their fathers came forth out of Egypt
